name: LD47 - THE LOOPING LEGEND
description:
Controls:
W, A, S, D - Movement
Space - Shoot ( can be held down )
P - Pause game ( Use this immediately in-game to bring up fullscreen and other settings )

IMPORTANT: The sound settings may need multiple clicks to register

- Other controls are displayed in-game

Description:
Your plane got stuck in the up position and now you're gonna have to dog-fight other planes while in a bit of a pickle.

- Disclaimer, the game is a little hard, but the pickups should help, I had to make it hard as I was running out of time.
